name: CPAP Hose Holder for Bed – Adjustable 360° Swivel Hose Hanger, Prevents Kinking & Blockage, No-Drill Bedside Hose Support for Easier Sleep, Compatible with All CPAP Tubing
short_description: 【Improve Sleep Quality & Airflow】This CPAP hose holder for bed keeps your tubing elevated to help prevent kinking, tangling, blockage, or compression while turning during sleep. Supports smooth and consistent airflow from your CPAP machine for a more comfortable nighttime experience.

【Adjustable Tension Clip & 360° Rotating Head】Features a tension-adjustable hose clip, allowing you to tighten or loosen the grip to fit different CPAP hoses securely without crushing them. The 360° rotating clip head lets the hose move freely in any direction, reducing mask pulling and improving comfort.

【Flexible & Fully Adjustable Hose Hanger】Designed with a PVC-coated flexible metal arm that bends easily and rotates 360°, functioning as a CPAP hose stand / hose lift. Allows precise height and angle adjustment to keep the hose positioned above you and out of the way while sleeping.

【No-Drill Bedside Clamp Installation】Uses a sturdy no-drill C-clamp CPAP hose hook (fits surfaces up to 2.56"), designed for secure attachment to bed frames, headboards, or bedside tables. Installs in seconds with no tools, drilling, or adhesive required.

【Universal CPAP Accessory for Bedside Organization】Compatible with all standard CPAP hoses and CPAP machines. Helps keep your bedside area organized, reduces hose drag and nighttime disruptions, and is suitable for daily home use or travel.
product_description: CPAP Hose Holder for Bed – Adjustable 360° Swivel CPAP Hose Hanger with Tension Control Clip, Prevents Kinks & Blockage, No-Drill Bedside CPAP Tube Holder Hook, Universal CPAP Accessories
